thread.section_title: Leo Hostel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Vibe - Best Location
thread.title_full: Great Vibe - Best Location - Review of Leo Hostel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: smackO
title: Great Vibe - Best Location
text:
you know some hostels, no atmosphere, not clean, terrible location, unsafe - well Leo is none of these.
The staff and the diverse range of people make this one of the very best hostels I've stayed at anywhere. There's always people to talk to in the common room and find company for drinks or dinner or adventures. Every day.
The dorms are clean and comfortable.
The one and only complaint is that the only toilets are downstairs via the common room.
The location is also amazing. Supermarket next door and some of the best value dining and shopping in all of beijing all in the 600 year old Dashilar area. It's like walking out on a movie set everyday.
